response.description: The email address participant1@example.com is valid, properly formatted, and is associated with a mail server that is currently accepting mails. The domain example.com is known to have reliable email services. With a high quality score, there is a strong likelihood that emails sent to this address will be successfully delivered.

The email address participant1@example.com is valid and the format conforms to standard email formatting rules. However, under the 'Express' option, the address is currently not deliverable, which may be due to the mailbox being full, the server being down, or other temporary issues. The domain example.com typically has a good reputation, but deliverability can fluctuate. With a quality score of 0.85, caution is recommended when sending time-sensitive communications to this email address, as deliverability is not guaranteed.

The email address participant1@example.com is recognized as valid with a standard compliant email format. Using the 'Express' verification level, our system indicates that this email is currently non-deliverable, which could result from issues such as a full inbox, a non-responsive mail server, or other temporary deliverability problems. The domain example.com generally upholds a positive deliverability reputation, although it is subject to occasional fluctuations that might affect immediate email delivery. With a quality score of 0.85, senders should exercise caution when sending time-critical emails to this address, since immediate deliverability cannot be assured under these conditions.
